languages.text: "Смири свой гнев, подобный бушующим ветрам пустынных миров, и послушай, элантах".

traits.locale_text: "Смири свой гнев, подобный бушующим ветрам пустынных миров, и послушай, элантах".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Elantach, your anger is like the raging winds of desert worlds — restrain it, and listen."
languages.original_text: "Смири свой гнев, подобный бушующим ветрам пустынных миров, и послушай, элантах".

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, restrain your anger, which is like the raging winds of desert worlds, and listen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, restrain your anger, which is like the raging winds of desert worlds, and listen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, restrain your anger, which is like the raging winds of desert worlds, and listen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, restrain your anger, which is like the raging winds of desert worlds, and listen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, your anger is like the raging winds of desert worlds — restrain it, and listen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, your anger is like the raging winds of desert worlds — restrain it, and listen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Elantach, tu cólera es como los sirocos de un mundo desértico. Refrénala y escucha».
languages.original_text: "Elantach, your anger is like the raging winds of desert worlds — restrain it, and listen."

traits.locale_text: «Elantach, refrena tu cólera, que es como los sirocos de un mundo desértico, y escucha».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “外界人，你的怒火正像沙漠世界中的狂风一样肆虐。冷静下来，听我说。”
languages.original_text: "Elantach, your anger is like the raging winds of desert worlds — restrain it, and listen."

traits.locale_text: “外界人，你的怒火正像沙漠世界中的狂风一样肆虐。冷静下来，听我说。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Votre colère se déchaîne comme les tempêtes des mondes désertiques, elantach. Réprimez-la et écoutez. »
languages.original_text: "Elantach, your anger is like the raging winds of desert worlds — restrain it, and listen."

traits.locale_text: « Votre colère se déchaîne comme les tempêtes des mondes désertiques, elantach. Réprimez-la et écoutez. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「エランタよ、砂漠惑星の荒れ狂う風のような怒りを抑えて、耳を傾けろ」
languages.original_text: "Elantach, your anger is like the raging winds of desert worlds — restrain it, and listen."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタよ、砂漠の荒れ狂う風のような怒りを抑えて、耳を傾けろ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Elantach, Euer Zorn ist wie die wütenden Winde auf Wüstenwelten ist. Zügelt ihn und hört zu."
languages.original_text: "Elantach, your anger is like the raging winds of desert worlds — restrain it, and listen."

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, zügelt Euren Zorn, der wie die wütenden Winde auf Wüstenwelten ist, und hört zu."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Elantach, öfken âdeta çöl dünyaların kasıp kavuran rüzgârları gibi. Onu dizginleyip dinle."
languages.original_text: "Elantach, your anger is like the raging winds of desert worlds — restrain it, and listen."

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, öfken âdeta çöl dünyaların kasıp kavuran rüzgârları gibi. Onu dizginleyip dinle."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
